changes: Fixed changelog date stamp to correctly display date of patch
Removed 'stores' property from upgrades, as they're now redundent
Updated upgradeUtils to have a mapper function to map a list to a upgrade object to help make it easier to diagnose problems

patchTitle: Refactored UI Components to Reduce Re-Rendering
changes: Extracted UI components specifically for the gold UI elements so that there's no redundent complete re-rendering of all gold UI elements
